description: I'm a forty-four-year-old widower who, after four years, is ready to give love another try. I am a natural healer and a writer. I like to read, go for walks, watch movies and generally hang out with my significant other. I'm up for meeting new people, trying new things and having new experiences - hope you are too. Send me a message and let's see if we connect.
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
